title: The Girl Who Cried Monster
description: SHE’S TELLING THE TRUTH . . . BUT NO ONE BELIEVES HER.Lucy likes to tell monster stories. She’s told so many that her friends and family are sick of it.Then one day Lucy discovers a real, live monster: the librarian in charge of the summer reading program.Too bad Lucy’s told so many monster tall tales.Too bad no one believes a word she says. Too bad the monster knows who she is . . .. . . and is coming after her next.
author: R.L. Stine
